question: What is WeStudy used for?
answer: WeStudy can be used as a productivity app or a social app. We made sure to provide users with the time management and task tracking capabilities, while also making sure to include a social platform to connect users with friends.

question: Is WeStudy free?
answer: Yes, WeStudy is a completely free application. All features are available to users at no cost.

question: What can I do with WeStudy?
answer: On WeStudy, you can keep track of tasks for the day and the upcoming week, join study groups for classes you're currently taking, and keep yourself and your friends accountable. WeStudy also helps users become more productive and use their time more efficiently by encouraging users to take productive breaks throughout the day. We all get burnt out working all day, it's important to remember to take a break! WeStudy also increases motivation through incentivization of awards. Users can gain their own personal awards, as well as working together in their study groups to achieve group awards!

question: How can I check my friends' progress?
answer: By going to the friend's page and clicking on their profile, you can see a progress bar with their task completition progress for the day. So if you see that your friend has only finished 1 of their 7 tasks for the day, and its already 6pm.. message them to do their work!!

question: How can I see my future tasks for the week?
answer: At the top of the tasks page, the WeStudy application allows you to filter between your current tasks and your tasks for the week ahead. Just go ahead and add your tasks, and the WeStudy app will automatically filter them for you.

question: How can I earn awards?
answer: You can earn awards in a multitude of ways! Just make sure you are logging your tasks, taking study breaks, and utilizing all the WeStudy functionalities so that you can earn awards.

question: How can I schedule a break?
answer: In the breaks page, you have the ability to schedule breaks at any time of the day! Through WeStudy, once you join a Study Group, you are also able to schedule breaks with my group mates as well.
